meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of October 22, 2024 minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Discussion on Dallas Public Facility Corporation and Dallas Housing Finance Corporation
agenda_items.description: Discussion led by Cynthia Rogers-Ellickson and Keith Pomykal regarding the Dallas Public Facility Corporation and Dallas Housing Finance Corporation.

agenda_items.title: Discussion on TDHCA and DHFC Mortgage Bond Program
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the Texas Department of Housing & Community Affairs and Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Mortgage Bond Program.

agenda_items.title: Overview of the 4% Low Income Housing Tax Credit (HTC) Program
agenda_items.description: Overview presented by Teresa Morales on the 4% Low Income Housing Tax Credit Program.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Dallas Housing Finance Corporation presented by Marcy Helfand.

agenda_items.title: Opportunities for Housing Finance Corporations
agenda_items.description: Discussion on opportunities for housing finance corporations led by Derra Purnell.

agenda_items.title: Discussion on House Bill 2071 and its impact on PFCâ€™s
agenda_items.description: Discussion on House Bill 2071 and its implications for Public Facility Corporations presented by James Plummer.

agenda_items.title: Comparison of the bylaws for the City of Dallas Local Government Corporations and Recommendations of Changes
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the comparison of bylaws and recommendations for changes presented by Lisa D. Mares, Hannah Peacock, and Marissa Hines.
agenda_items.presenter: Lisa D. Mares, Hannah Peacock, Marissa Hines
